item.title: What to do when an error message "error: Failed to merge in the changes" appears when executing brew update.
item.description: This article explains how to solve an error message “error: Failed to merge in the changes” appears when executing brew update. The following lists are the table of contents about this article. Target audience Environment Preconditions Executing brew update-reset What does brew update-reset command do? Reference articles Target audience Those who want to break through the errors that occur when executing brew update and update Homebrew. Environment WSL 2 (Ubuntu 20.
